Salisbury Fall Festival

Fall Festival 2021 announcements

The 2020 Salisbuiry Fall Festival, scheduled for October 9 - 11 has been cancelled due to the uncertain health risks of Covid-19 this Fall.

We plan to hold the event in October 2021. Please put us on your calendar for a wonderful, fun-filled celebration in the historic town of Salisbury, CT.

See you next year!
